name: Freetime Event: Poolside Edition
description:
hello, yndr4hope here-- i did this for ilujam but missed the deadline, so this was just practice to learn ren'py! it's a super danganronpa 2 fangame about a freetime event with komaeda nagito. it is NSFW! there's currently no music so please listen to "Beautiful Ruin (Summer Salt)" for the full experience. there is a pool. enjoy!

UPDATE: there is now a sequel to this game: Freetime Event: Theatrical Release, available here!  https://yndr4hope.itch.io/freetime-event-theatrical-release 

if you enjoyed these games or any of my other work and would like to buy me a coffee, i have a ko-fi now💖  https://ko-fi.com/yndrhope

thank you for playing! i never expected this little project to get so many downloads but it makes me really happy
